paragraphs: They've had me working down here for days now.  It's not the time that's getting to me though, it's these tunnels.  I've told them countless times now to add extra supports to the weak sections of tunnel.  If only we had more of those wooden beams that we reinforced with bronze bottoms.  Honestly, if I hear the earth shift one more time above my head I'll be so stressed I may stop drinking for good.  I mean, what's a Nord without his mead.
